author: van't Westeinde, Susan C and de Koning, Harry J and Thunnissen, Frederik B and Oudkerk, Matthijs and Groen, Harry JM and Lammers, Jan-Willem J and Weenink, Carla and Vernhout, Rene and Nackaerts, Kristiaan and Mali, Willem and others
title: The Role of the (18) F-Fluorodeoxyglucose-Positron Emission Tomography Scan in the Nederlands Leuvens Longkanker Screenings Onderzoek Lung Cancer Screening Trial
